page.title: 15 Tremabe Farm
page.content:
Tremabe Farm has 111 acres and is farmed by Mr. Stephens. There is one field of potatoes, two fields of barley and the rest is grass. The stock on the farm consists of 100 ewes and 4 suckling cows. There are also some Charolais, Scimital and Limousin cattle which are used for showing at the County shows. On the farm there are two tractors but most of the work is contracted out.
Some of the farm buildings are old. One of them was built in 1800. There was an old water wheel on the farm which had been used for grinding corn.
